text: Hamilton Green (born 9 November 1934)"Hamilton Green", The West Indian Encyclopedia. is Guyanese politician and once Prime Minister of Guyana. He was a member of People's National Congress and chosen as one of the five Vice Presidents in the cabinet of Forbes Burnham in October 1980. He also served as the Prime Minister of Guyana from 6 August 1985 to 9 October 1992. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Guyana Category:People from Georgetown, Guyana
title: Hamilton Green
